import axios from'axios';import{cacheAdapterEnhancer}from'axios-extensions';import axiosCancel from'axios-cancel';/*import Cookies from 'js-cookie'*/ /* http 객체 생성 :: axios 모듈 사용*/export var http=axios.create({baseURL:'http://45.120.69.125:8001/react',adapter:cacheAdapterEnhancer(axios.defaults.adapter,{enabledByDefault:false})});axiosCancel(http,{debug:false// process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development'
});export var CancelToken=axios.CancelToken;/*해야 할 일 API 목록 리스트 정의 :: list, addlist, removetodo, checktodo */var Todo={list:function list(){var _ref=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{},config=_ref.config;return http.get("/list",null,config);},addlist:function addlist(){var _ref2=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{},text=_ref2.text,color=_ref2.color,config=_ref2.config;return http.post("/addlist",{text:text,color:color},config);},removetodo:function removetodo(){var _ref3=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{},id=_ref3.id,config=_ref3.config;return http.post("/removetodo",{id:id},config);},checktodo:function checktodo(){var _ref4=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{},id=_ref4.id,checked=_ref4.checked,config=_ref4.config;return http.post("/checktodo",{id:id,checked:checked},config);}};export default{Todo:Todo};
